naslov: PRODAJA kuća za odmor 160 m2, bazen, Perušić Benkovački (prodaja)
opis: Kuća sa bazenom u Benkovcu - Perušić Benkovački (160 m2) Na prodaju je šarmantna vila s bazenom u dalmatinskom zaleđu, smještena u malom mjestu Perušić Benkovački. Opis: Ova prekrasna kuća ima ukupnu površinu od 160 m2, a sastoji se od prizemlja i prvog kata. Prizemlje uključuje: - Ulazni hodnik - Kuhinja s blagovaonicom - Dnevni boravak - Mali WC - Kupaonica - 2 spavaće sobe - Terasa - Mala ostava ispod stepenica Vanjske stepenice vode na 1. kat, koji se sastoji od: - Ulaznog hodnika - Kupaonice - Kuhinje s blagovaonicom - Dnevnog boravka - 2 spavaće sobe - Balkona Dvorište je veliko, dobro održavano i potpuno ograđeno. Sadrži: - Veliki bazen s vanjskim tušem - Sunčalište s ležaljkama - Dječje igralište - Opremljenu ljetnu kuhinju s prostorom za sjedenje Kuća je potpuno namještena i opremljena. Smještena je u mirnom okruženju, udaljena 3,9 kilometra od grada Benkovca, 18 kilometara od mora u Karinu (22 min. vožnje) i 21 kilometar od Biograda na Moru. Za dodatne informacije i dogovor oko pregleda, slobodno nazovite na +385917910007 (Zorica) ili kontaktirajte putem WhatsApp/Viber. House with Pool in Benkovac - Perušić Benkovački (160 m2) For sale is this charming villa with a pool, located in the hinterland of Dalmatia, in the small village of Perušić Benkovački. Description: This beautiful house has a total area of 160 m2 and consists of a ground floor and a first floor. Ground floor includes: - Entrance hallway - Kitchen with dining area - Living room - Small WC - Bathroom - 2 Bedrooms - Terrace - Small storage space under the stairs External stairs lead to the first floor, which consists of: - Entrance hallway - Bathroom - Kitchen with dining area - Living room - 2 Bedrooms - Balcony The yard is large, well-maintained, and completely fenced. It features: - Large pool with an outdoor shower - Sunbathing area with loungers - Children's playground - Equipped summer kitchen with seating area The house is fully furnished and equipped. It is located in a quiet area, just 3.9 km from the town of Benkovac, 18 km from the sea in Karinu (22 min. drive), and 21 km from Biograd na Moru. For more information and to schedule a viewing, feel free to call +385917910007 (Zorica) or contact via WhatsApp/Viber.
